name: Casino Royale (Elvin04)
description:
Hello, 

I present you my second game made on unity at la Horde school, it was made in one week, so there is only one level, but there could be more in the future.

The main objectives were : 

- The top-down character controller is functional

- A level adapted to this type of view is used

- Enemy is on patrol

- Enemy is chasing the player

- Enemy can kill the player

- Enemy interrupts patrol to chase player

- Enemy leaves the pursuit to return to his patrol after losing sight of the player

This time, I made 2 versions, one for ZQSD players and one for WASD players, so for moving, it depends on the version you download 

To open the inventory, you have to press the I key of the keyboard, and the same to close it

There are some bugs that I already know, like the light of the enemies or the animations of the enemies, but if you encounter bugs, you can send them to me

The characters and animations were taken from mixamo.com

Thanks to those who will read this and play the game

Elvin
